analysisEngineMetaData.name: LiaNERawTextAED
analysisEngineMetaData.description:
* This AE is a wrapper for the LIA NE main program, which is actually a script calling different subprograms (including CRF++). * It tags named entities using the LIA NE CRF model, see LIA NE documentation. Only for French
* * IMPORTANT: * The LIA NE script calls several subprograms, in particular the LIA TAGG nomb2alpha program. This program converts any * number/digit into a sequences of (letters) words (e.g. "1978" becomes "mille neuf cent soixante dix huit"). This is the reason why the * annotated output text is different from the original one. Therefore the NE tagging CAN NOT BE represented in the input text contained in * the CAS, this is why this AE CREATES A NEW VIEW containing the result. This is a very special behaviour but there is no general way * to correctly annotate the input text, because it is not possible to match the input and output texts (for example if the original text is * "En 2010 23 personnes sont mortes de rire", then in the output there is no way to know whre is the frontier between "2010" and "23" in * "deux mille dix ving trois"). * As a second consequence, the text written in the new view is tokenized arbitrarily with one token by line (because again it is not possible * to find the exact original form of whitespace separators).

configurationParameter.name: TimeOut
configurationParameter.description: Time limit before interrupting TagEN process (seconds). Default = 0 = no time limit.

configurationParameter.name: CharacterCodingErrorReplacementValue
configurationParameter.description: Replacement value for character coding errors. Must contain only one character. If defined, this value will be used to replace unmappable characters in order to avoid this kind of error. Otherwise such errors will raise an exception, thus usually making the process fail.

configurationParameter.name: OutputViewName
configurationParameter.description: This component creates a new view to store the text received by LIA NE (and the annotations).

configurationParameter.name: RemoveEmptySentencesAfterDocumentEnd
configurationParameter.description: LIA NE tends to add empty useless sentences after the end of the document, set this flag to true to remove them.

configurationParameter.name: KeepSentencesAnnotations
configurationParameter.description: Keep the 'Sentence' tags returned by LIA NE

configurationParameter.name: RunIdValue
configurationParameter.description: Custom value that will be written in the "runId" feature of all output annotations
